review: I am loving this after turning in my cable boxes and saving $150/month on TV.  The box works great.  I haven't had much luck with the voice control but I think I need practice with it.  My adult children have them and don't have trouble with it.  I got this half price but subscribing to Sling TV.  It also is synced to all my Amazon services, Prime, music etc...can do it all on the TV.

review: Love love love....so this is what love is. Streams well using the cat5 connection. Has some problems with streaming HD via wireless, but everything I have has the same problems. No, it's not my router (have tried 3 different brands). But I know several others who have issues with streaming HD. So decided to do the hardwire thing and is well. Wifi is great when you have no other option, but if you have access to the "wire", that's the way to go.

review: I like many things about the Amazon Fire TV. It is fast, has excellent HD, and the remote is user friendly. The sound is extremely quiet. I have a competitors product that also has some nice features but the definition is not nearly as good and it has a loud hum on audio. The optical output on the Fire TV worked perfectly and sounds great. I do miss Acorn TV. We enjoy British Television so we watch it often. That is what I miss most on Fire TV. Except for that, it would be perfect.
author: Bob D
